entry.title: Quantum in Too Much Detail
entry.summary: I originally posted this article on the RDO website. The players This document describes the architecture that results from a particular OpenStack configuration, specifically: Quantum networking using GRE tunnels; A dedicated network controller; A single instance running on a compute host Much of the document will be relevant to other configurations, but details will vary based on your choice of layer 2 connectivity, number of running instances, and so forth.
